content: üîé ¬†vbetFTN.COM ¬†üîéü•Å "And there's the call, folks! Attention all you football aficionados and betting connoisseurs!" ü•Å  VBET, the esteemed betting partner of Portsmouth FC, has an exciting announcement for the Bitcointalk community. Your prediction skills are about to be put to the test in a classic match predictor game for the round of 38 of Italian Serie A.How to participate:- Predict the 1 / X / 2 of each match- Include your vbetFTN userID in your reply- One correct answer gets you +1 point to the leaderboard- Any participant who has the most correct answers takes the prize pool- For the tiebreaker guess the total goals scored for all the matches combinedRewards:- 1st: $50 free bet- 2nd: $30 free bet- 3rd: $20 free betMatches:- Sassuolo vs Fiorentina- Torino vs Inter- Cremonese vs Salernitana- Empoli vs Lazio- Napoli vs Sampdoria- AC Milan vs Verona- AC Roma vs Spezia- Atalanta vs Monza- Lecce vs Bologna- Udinese vs JuventusGood luck to all participants in the challenge!
